text: Al Zerbarini (died 2 May 2012Nostalgia Gassers (retrieved 10 June 2017)) was an American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.180-6. Zerbarini drove an Oldsmobile-powered 1940 Willys dubbed Bee Line, sponsored by Bee-Line Automotive of Stamford, Connecticut, beginning in 1960. He won NHRA's first ever A/Gas Altered (A/GA) national title at Detroit Dragway in 1960. His winning pass was 12.61 seconds at .Davis, p.182. Zerbarini continued racing until 1968 but won no other NHRA gasser titles.Davis, pp.180-6. ==References== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp. 180–6. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers Category:2012 deaths
title: Al Zerbarini
